title: What happened to rotating game modes?
body: I miss being able to play these alternate game modes every week or so. Why were they taken away? Will they be brought back?

replies.body: Riot was spending too much dev time on making new ones. Now they focus on event game mides that take a few months to make instead if you rushing a new one every few weeks. They said that they would rotate I. Old favorites between the event maps though
